 Upon receiving a WATCHDOG_MESSAGE message, if the RspSize field is set to a non-zero value, then the device shall respond with a WATCHDOG_MESSAGE with the RspSize field set to zero, and RspSize -1 octets of additional RandomData. More...

Detailed Description

Function Documentation

CSRmeshResult WatchdogModelInit ( CsrUint8  nw_id,
CsrUint16 *  group_id_list,
CsrUint16  num_groups,
CSRMESH_MODEL_CALLBACK_T  app_callback 
)

Registers the model handler with the CSRmesh. Sets the CSRmesh to report num_groups as the maximum number of groups supported for the model

Parameters
nw_idIdentifier of the network to which the model has to be registered.
group_id_listPointer to a uint16 array to hold assigned group_ids. This must be NULL if no groups are supported
num_groupsSize of the group_id_list. This must be 0 if no groups are supported.
app_callbackPointer to the application callback function. This function will be called to notify all model specific messages
Returns
CSRmeshResult. Refer to CSRmeshResult.
CSRmeshResult WatchdogMessage ( CsrUint8  nw_id,
CsrUint16  dest_id,
CSRMESH_WATCHDOG_MESSAGE_T *  p_params 
)

This function packs the given parameters into a CSRmesh message and sends it over the network. When a response is received the application callback function is called to notify the CSRMESH_WATCHDOG_MESSAGE

Parameters
nw_idNetwork identifier over which the message has to be sent.
dest_id16-bit identifier of the destination device/group
p_paramsPointer to the message parameters of type CSRMESH_WATCHDOG_MESSAGE_T
Returns
CSRmeshResult. Refer to CSRmeshResult.
CSRmeshResult WatchdogInterval ( CsrUint8  nw_id,
CsrUint16  dest_id,
CSRMESH_WATCHDOG_INTERVAL_T *  p_params 
)

This function packs the given parameters into a CSRmesh message and sends it over the network.

Parameters
nw_idNetwork identifier over which the message has to be sent.
dest_id16-bit identifier of the destination device/group
p_paramsPointer to the message parameters of type CSRMESH_WATCHDOG_INTERVAL_T
Returns
CSRmeshResult. Refer to CSRmeshResult.
